context: Premise: When all the individual pieces of the garment have been modified and entered into the computer system, the final garment pattern is ready to be cut and sewn into a sample garment. The premise states that when all individual pieces of the garment have been modified and entered into the computer system, the final garment pattern is ready to be cut and sewn into a sample garment. The hypothesis rephrases this by saying that the final pattern would be ready to become a sample after the individual parts of the garment have been fixed and uploaded onto the computer system.
